divs: sighting detailsi am over at my gfs place and about 45 mins ago (2:40 am), i saw an object streak across the sky that kind of looked like a meteor. i lost sight of it when it went "behind" me and the carport blocked it from my sight. it looked like an object that had a tail of light behind it. the front looked like a yellow\white hot object kinda "baseball" shape. it may be a meteor. i figure i may as well report this thing i saw, so it can be looked into. it happened at this address: *(address removed--cms\sg). i was facing south smokin a cig before bed and i looked up and saw an object streaking from north to south. when i was lookin south, the object was a little to the right of me. i had to turn my head slightly to the right and up a little to see it. in other words, it was on my right side but obviously in the sky. i believe it was to the west of me.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Oregon City
There were no other sightings in Oregon City on or around May 1st 2011
